panels.description: The number of times the service has executed since the Microservices Runtime last started.
panels.title: CPU consumption

panels.description: The number of times the service has executed since the Microservices Runtime last started.
panels.title: Memory consumption

panels.description: The number of times the service has executed since the Microservices Runtime last started.
panels.title: Disk consumption

panels.description: The number of times the service has executed since the Microservices Runtime last started.
panels.title: Thread consumption

panels.description:
The total number of HTTP/S requests since the last statistics poll. The statistics poll interval is controlled by the watt.server.stats.pollTime server configuration parameter. The default interval is 60 seconds.
A request is included in this metric if it calls a top-level service, the service was not canceled, the service is not in a circuit breaker flow step, and the service does not belong to a package listed for the watt.server.stats.packages.exclude server configuration parameter.
panels.title: sag_is_http_requests

panels.description: The number of top-level services started each minute.
panels.title: sag_is_request_starts_per_minute

panels.description:
The total number of HTTP/S requests since Microservices Runtime startup.
A request is included in this metric if it calls a top-level service, the service was not canceled, the service is not in a circuit breaker flow step, and the service does not belong to a package listed for the watt.server.stats.packages.exclude server configuration parameter.
panels.title: sag_is_total_http_requests

panels.description: The number of top-level services started each minute.
panels.title: sag_is_service_starts_per_minute

panels.description: The number of service errors since startup, which includes any service that gets an exception of any kind.
panels.title: sag_is_number_​service_errors

panels.description: The number of service errors in the last minute.
panels.title: sag_is_number_​​service_​errors_per_minute

panels.description: The number of successful service invokes and service errors since Microservices Runtime startup. This metric excludes services in a package set in the watt.server.stats.packages.exclude parameter.
panels.title: sag_is_number_service_invokes

panels.description: The running average for the connection time expressed in milliseconds. This can also be described as the average session time or how long a connection is kept alive.
panels.title: sag_is_average_connection_time

panels.description: The number of service errors in the last minute, which includes any service that gets an exception of any kind but excludes any services in a package set in the watt.server.stats.packages.exclude server configuration parameter.
panels.title: sag_is_number_service_errors_​excluding_internal_svc_​per_minute

panels.description: The number of errors that were caused by exceptions that are not ServiceExceptions. This is the same value returned by sag_is_number_unknown_errors.
panels.title: sag_is_number_​nonservice_errors

panels.description: The number of sessions used since Microservices Runtime startup.
panels.title: sag_is_number_sessions_used

panels.description: The number of current connections to the Microservices Runtime where the connection is a session which can be created multiple ways such as through an HTTP connection, a trigger, the scheduler, etc.
panels.title: sag_is_current_stateful_sessions

panels.description: Number of aggregated API invocations.
panels.title: sag_apigw_tx_count

panels.description: Number of aggregated execution errors.
panels.title: sag_apigw_exec_error_count

panels.description: Total number of API invocations per response code
panels.title: sag_apigw_apicalls_total

panels.description: Number of exceptions for component
panels.title: sag_apigw_component_error_count

panels.description: Number of exceptions for persisting analytics transactions to es
panels.title: sag_apigw_analytics_persist_error_count

panels.description: Number of API invocations.
panels.title: sag_apigw_api_tx_count

panels.description: Number of transaction errors
panels.title: sag_apigw_api_tx_error_count

panels.description: Number of unexpected execution errors.
panels.title: sag_apigw_api_exec_error_count
